episodes.title: Escaping Evil: My Life in a Cult | Part 1| Full Episode | LMN
episodes.description:
A man blindly follows god-like cult leader Yahweh Ben Yahweh even when Yahweh unleashes a bloody campaign of murders and beheadings. He maintains his devotion until Yahweh's tyranny and violence are turned against his devoted followers. See more in Season 1, Episode 3, "Episode 3."

#EscapingEvil
